description: Debug using Chrome DevTools, check for overlapping elements, and ensure onClick works properly.
Optimize images, use lazy loading, and remove unused JavaScript to enhance performance.
Implement category and price filters with dynamic rendering using JavaScript.
Resolve form validation issue on checkout page to prevent empty submission.
Create a fully responsive navbar for mobile and tablet views using Tailwind CSS.
Add an email subscription form with Mailchimp API and validate user input.
